title: Chinese tech companies rocket as politburo hints at letup in crippling crackdown - Moneycontrol
content: Chinese tech companies rocket as politburo hints at letup in crippling crackdown  Moneycontrol
description: The Hang Seng Tech Index jumped as much as 11 percent in Hong Kong, the most since March 17. Shares of Chinese tech firms rocketed in Hong Kong, with JD.com and Alibaba rising around 15 percent, while Tencent shares jumped 11 percent.
